DOC.brief_summary: Background : - The drug rosuvastatin ( also call Crestor ) use low cholesterol level people elevate cholesterol level . Recent study suggest rosuvastatin may affect immune system reduce inflammation , reason effect unclear . Researchers interested test effect rosuvastatin immune system healthy volunteer good cholesterol level . Objectives : - To evaluate effect rosuvastatin immune system healthy volunteer . Eligibility : - Healthy individual least 18 year age acceptable blood level LDL cholesterol ( 160 ) . Design : - Participants screen medical history physical examination , well blood test check general health , cholesterol level , liver function , C-reactive protein ( respond inflammation ) . - Participants permit take prescription over-the-counter medication affect immune system , include antihistamine certain pain reliever . For 1 week study , participant wash-out period without medication . - Participants take rosuvastatin daily 4 week , always even ( ensure consistent blood sample result ) . - Participants provide blood sample follow time point : ( 1 ) immediately start rosuvastatin treatment , ( 2 ) 2 week treatment , ( 3 ) 4 week treatment , ( 4 ) 2 week end treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Rosuvastatin Immune System Healthy Volunteers With Normal Cholesterol
DOC.detailed_description: Statins drug inhibit cholesterol synthesis use extensively primary secondary prevention heart disease . Their benefit patient heart diseases appear exceed predict cholesterol lower alone . A recent study find benefit statin therapy patient normal cholesterol high C-reactive protein , marker inflammation , suggest statin exert anti inflammatory effect addition well know cholesterol lower activity . Studies mouse reveal mixed observation regard role statin inflammation . Therefore Center Human Immunology , Autoimmunity Inflammation conduct trial study effect statins immune system inflammatory response healthy volunteer normal cholesterol level , normal elevate C-reactive protein level . The primary objective characterize immune system statin therapy .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Healthy volunteer ( health status confirm brief History Physical Exam routine blood work determine screen protocol ) Age great equal to18 year age LDL < 160 mg/dL Ten subject must hsCRP < 2mg/L , ten subject must hsCRP great equal 2 mg/L Subjects psoriasis otherwise healthy , received systemic imunosuppression past 6 month Subjects fast glucose < 125 mg/dL EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Female subject may pregnant lactate due minor side effect use statin nonbenefit study . Abnormal LFT , i.e . AST > 34 U/L ; ALT > 41 U/L ; T. Bilirubin > 1.0 mg/dL ; Alkaline Phosphatasse > 116 U/L . Other contraindication statin ( i.e . inadequately treated hypothyroidism , renal impairment , liver disease , elevated transaminase , diabetes mellitus hypersensitivity statin ) Subjects unable comprehend investigational nature procedure unable unwilling sign consent . Statin usage within last six month prior enrollment . Diabetes mellitus Subjects willing participate gene expression analysis whole genome expression polymorphism study portion protocol .
